plz give guide on what to do!

item.title: How do i add commands?
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

[quote=“hell boi, post:6, topic:179324”]rofl just because your a expert so called “coder” doesnt mean that everyone is good with computers. i dont use computer like you.

if your the clever one then post pics of how to add a command.

no? Thought so…[/quote]

First off, your the kid that kept posting the same damn thing about 5 times this week
Second, If you read you’d know that mods and everyone else that has been here for a long time know that they shouldn’t give them the answer straight away. They want you to do the work and not get freebies like you’re asking for.
Also you don’t have to be good at computers to be a good coder. My friend is good at coding and isn’t good at about everything else on the computer.

By the way…did you say YOU DON’T USE COMPUTERS LIKE HE DOES? Dude I’ve seen you all week on this section asking for about the same thing.

Read full topic

Sorry for spazzing out i’m just pissed from other things

item.title: How do i add commands?
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

First, get your command.
Then, press ctrl + f and search “pickup” and under the last } add the command
Last, save you’re changes and double click “compile” and type “c” and see if there any errors.
if you get any errors, you’re code is messed up or the dumb c+p code sucks and hopefully you got your back up client.java and can fix your mistake.

Dosn’t need pictures at all…

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add commands?
item.dc:creator: @barrage_time barrage time
item.description:
@barrage_time wrote:

I’ll tell you how to add a command, nothing else.

Search for:
“pickup”

After the last { add the command you want to add, easy.
